name: FPS Sniper Commando Action PRo
description:
Tag and shoot! Sniper Commando Action Pro is real frontline action shooting game to fight against enemies. The Sniper Commando Action Pro having amazing shooter game-play and be engaging missions. Play this game you will feel like in a real combat. Grab your gun and show your fps army shooting skills and don't let the enemies escape. Let's go for commando sniper mission in the real Sahara desert old city with the 3D realistic environment and awesome graphics.

This is a action FPS shooting game that developed for the fans of shooting games. It gives you the exciting experience to complete the mission. Download now Sniper Commando Action Pro. Turn your phone into shooting game battlefield. Gear your sniper shooter rifle and complete tough hitman missions to shoot down enemies in the desert battlefield.

GAME TOP FEATURES
- 10 Engaging hitman sniper shooter missions
- Engaging combat against enemies in the desert region
- Extreme missions in the later stages to test your ultimate sniper shooter skills
- A realistic 3d Sahara desert city environment
